lexUnit.name: decade.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: (of an event or state) lasting ten years

sentence.text: Launched on a miniscule budget and a surge of dubious optimism , held together in the first eighteen months by a poultice of desperation and blind faith ( not to mention liberal applications of cow gum and sellotape ) , still independent after a decade of brinkmanship publishing this is a tremendous achievement .
